data.actual_result: It's actually under the userprofile (look at the gif)
data.expected_result: The settings modal should pop up over the userprofile
data.short_description: If you open the notification settings or privacy settings the modal is under the user profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a user - Go to mutual servers - Try to right click on a server then "Notification settings" or "Privacy settings"
